snippet.title: Fretless - The Wrath of Riffson Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Tune a corrupted world into harmony in Fretless: The Wrath of Riffson, a turn-based RPG where you defy enemies with deadly licks and riffs. A new trailer revealed more gameplay from this musical adventure, which is coming to PC on May 22.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #fretless 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
